scripts.dev: concurrently --kill-others --raw -n "py,sass,wbpck" -c "gray,green.inverse,blue.inverse" ".venv/bin/python manage.py runserver" "node-sass -rw static/_scss/ --output static/css/" "webpack --watch"; exit 0
scripts.deploy: /bin/bash -c "PIPENV_VENV_IN_PROJECT='1' pipenv sync && .venv/bin/python manage.py migrate && .venv/bin/python manage.py collectstatic --noinput && touch ../yimteam_uwsgi.ini"
